sqlList.sql: select count(*) from t_lm_hotel_blacklist b left join t_lm_b_Prop p on b.hotel_id = p.prop where ((:HOTELID IS NULL) OR (b.hotel_id=:HOTELID)) and ((:SOURCE IS NULL) OR (source=:SOURCE)) and ((:ISBLACK IS NULL) OR (is_black=:ISBLACK)) and is_black=1

select b.id, b.hotel_id, b.source, (case b.is_black when '1' then '黑名单' else '白名单' end ) as is_black, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.create_user, b.update_user,p.prop_name_zh from t_lm_hotel_blacklist b left join t_lm_b_Prop p on b.hotel_id = p.prop where ((:HOTELID IS NULL) OR (b.hotel_id=:HOTELID)) and ((:SOURCE IS NULL) OR (source=:SOURCE)) and ((:ISBLACK IS NULL) OR (is_black=:ISBLACK)) and is_black=1 order by id desc
insert into t_lm_hotel_blacklist(id, hotel_id, is_black, source, create_time,create_user) values(:ID,:HOTELID,:ISBLACK,:SOURCE,sysdate,:CREATEUSER)
update t_lm_hotel_blacklist set is_black=:ISBLACK where id=:ID
update t_lm_hotel_blacklist set is_black=:ISBLACK,UPDATE_TIME=sysdate,UPDATE_USER=:UPDATEUSER where hotel_id=:HOTELID and SOURCE=:SOURCE
select * from t_lm_hotel_blacklist where hotel_id=:HOTELID and SOURCE=:SOURCE
